jparsec.astrophysics

Class PCAElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.astrophysics.PCAElement

  • public class PCAElement
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to hold the results of a PCA (Principal Component Analysis) calculation. Internal implementation is based on singular value decomposition, using matrices. The implemented follows the tutorial at http://www.ce.yildiz.edu.tr/personal/songul/file/1097/principal_components.pdf.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor for a list of variables.
      PCAElement(double[][] data)
      Constructor for a matrix of data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PCAElement

        public PCAElement(double[][] data)
           throws JPARSECException
        Constructor for a matrix of data. First index of the array should have as size the number of independent variables, the second their values for each of them.
        Parameters:
        data - The data.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • PCAElement

        public PCAElement(java.util.ArrayList<double[]> data)
           throws JPARSECException
        Constructor for a list of variables. Each double array in the list will contain the values for each independent variable. Length should be the same for all them.
        Parameters:
        data - The data.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • reproduceOriginalData

        public double[][] reproduceOriginalData(int n)
                                 throws JPARSECException
        Reproduces the original data up to certain level given the value of the components to use.
        Parameters:
        n - Number of components to use to reproduce original data. 1 for principal component, 2 for 2 components, and so on.
        Returns:
        The data reproduced.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If the number of components is outside range 1 - number of singular values.

      • reproduceOriginalDataAsChart

        public CreateChart3D reproduceOriginalDataAsChart(int n,
                                         java.lang.String title,
                                         java.lang.String xLabel,
                                         java.lang.String yLabel,
                                         java.lang.String zLabel,
                                         java.lang.String leyend)
                                           throws JPARSECException
        Returns a 3d chart for the first 3 dimensions in the data reproduced to certain number of components n. In case of 2d input z will be set to 0s.
        Parameters:
        n - Number of components to use to reproduce original data. 1 for principal component, 2 for 2 components, and so on.
        title - Chart title.
        xLabel - Label for x axis.
        yLabel - Label for y axis.
        zLabel - Label for z axis.
        leyend - Leyend for the data.
        Returns:
        The chart.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • reproduceOriginalDataAsChart

        public CreateChart3D reproduceOriginalDataAsChart(int n,
                                         java.lang.String title,
                                         java.lang.String xLabel,
                                         java.lang.String yLabel,
                                         java.lang.String zLabel,
                                         java.lang.String leyend,
                                         int xIndex,
                                         int yIndex,
                                         int zIndex)
                                           throws JPARSECException
        Returns a 3d chart for 3 selected dimensions in the data reproduced to certain number of components n.
        Parameters:
        n - Number of components to use to reproduce original data. 1 for principal component, 2 for 2 components, and so on.
        title - Chart title.
        xLabel - Label for x axis.
        yLabel - Label for y axis.
        zLabel - Label for z axis.
        leyend - Leyend for the data.
        xIndex - Index of the column for the variable to show in x axis, 0 is the first.
        yIndex - Index of the column for the variable to show in y axis, 0 is the first.
        zIndex - Index of the column for the variable to show in z axis, 0 is the first.
        Returns:
        The chart.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

        public double[] getNewValues(int index)
                      throws JPARSECException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The new values for that axis.
